name: Last Posts Category and Post Types
author: Sinan Ä°ÅžLER

sections.description:
This plugin add a widget to the widgets zone.

You can configure the widget for show custom category posts,
custom post types posts and what you image with that.

Simple and easy to use.

Thanks for using

Features (en_EN):

  • You can show last posts on a category (slug name or id)
  • You can show last posts custom post types. (post type name)
  • You can show multiple posts as many as you want (custom number)
  • You can show multiple post type with seperating commas.

sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now you can use widget on widgets section.
sections.faq:
How can I use this plugin

This plug is add a widget on widgets zone.

Is there a settings page

Other then widget there is no setting or function page. It is very simple

and powerfull plugin.

Tell me something I dont know

If you are using this plugin you are very good man !
